snippet: The Senate has confirmed the nomination of David N. Saperstein, a prominent Reform rabbi, to be ambassador at large for international religious freedom, in charge of countering religious persecution around the world.
abstract: Senate confirms nomination of David N Saperstein to be ambassador at large for international religious freedom; Saperstein, a prominent Reform rabbi, will be in charge of countering religious persecution around the world.
